attributes.action: Children under the age of 16 should have a curfew to be indoors by 9.00pm
attributes.background: Children under the age of 16 should have a curfew to be indoors by 9.00pm to tackle the ongoing antisocial behaviour there is nothing on the streets for children there only going around terrorising people vandalising drinking smoking. If there caught out after 9 pm they should be consequences.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Curfews for children are the responsibility of parents and not the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.

If you would like Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal for anyone under the age of 16 to be outdoors after 9 pm, you could start a petition calling for that.
